web-app:
Olas Digipass Device Web Application &web-common-wicket; &web-error-codes;
WicketFilter org.apache.wicket.protocol.http.WicketFilter
applicationClassName
net.link.safeonline.digipass.webapp.DigipassApplication
configuration ${wicket.configuration}
WicketFilter /* REQUEST ERROR
CommercialName ${safe-online.commercial.name}
ApplicationName ${safe-online.digipass.webapp.name}
WsLocation ${safe-online.host.auth.basename}
JAASLoginFilter net.link.safeonline.sdk.auth.filter.JAASLoginFilter
LoginContextName client-login
JAASLoginFilter /*
AuthLandingServlet
net.link.safeonline.digipass.webapp.servlet.AuthLandingServlet
AuthenticationUrl authentication
ServletEndpointUrl
${safe-online.host.auth.basename}/${safe-online.digipass.webapp.name}/auth
Used to wrap the servlet request's request URL for verification of the receiving endpoint with the destination in the saml request.
ErrorPage protocol-error
AuthLandingServlet /auth
ExitServlet
net.link.safeonline.device.sdk.auth.servlet.ExitServlet
ErrorPage protocol-error
ExitServlet /authenticationexit
DeviceLandingServlet net.link.safeonline.digipass.webapp.servlet.DeviceLandingServlet
DisableUrl disable
EnableUrl enable
ServletEndpointUrl
${safe-online.host.auth.basename}/${safe-online.digipass.webapp.name}/device
Used to wrap the servlet request's request URL for verification of the receiving endpoint with the destination in the saml request.
ErrorPage protocol-error
DeviceLandingServlet /device
DeviceExitServlet net.link.safeonline.device.sdk.servlet.ExitServlet
ErrorPage protocol-error
DeviceExitServlet /deviceexit
DisableServlet net.link.safeonline.digipass.webapp.servlet.DisableServlet
DeviceExitPath deviceexit
DisableServlet /disable
Style Servlet
net.link.safeonline.webapp.resources.ApplicationStyleServlet
Style Servlet /theme.css
